title: Quick question about hybrid runes
body: I just bought Hybrid pen marks and quints, does anyone know which champions I can use this rune page on? Thanks

replies.body:
sorry to tell you this but, you wasted your ip on hybrid quints, you are much better off just using AP quints

But reds are good, you can use them in any match up where you are ranged vs melee, any other match up where you can harass with auto attacks a lot, or a champ that deals a good amount of both ad an ap (eg, fizz, akarli, corki)

corki, ahri, akali, xin, jax, kayle, eve, teemo, warwick, shaco, udyr, twisted fate, nidalee, diana, kogmaw... blah blah blah... stuff and champ with a guinsoo take your pick (only possible choise of pen rune for a kogmaw though. Don't. You. Forget. It. Seeing as he does 100% mixed damage and he gets a guinsoo)
Thanks for the list man! Can't wait to try it out :)
